message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product at a special price. I think you'll really love it, and I'm confident you'll get a great value out of it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing. I would like to counter with an offer of $10000 for the product.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $11500. I think this price still provides a great value for you, while also allowing me to get a fair price for the product.
